feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:41 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 7:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this morning then to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
